item.title: Wikipedia Article Downloader: A Shortcut for Offline Reading
item.description: I built a Shortcut that lets me quickly turn any Wikipedia link into a clean PDF, making it easy to save articles for offline reading, research, or archiving.

item.title: Automating My City's Garbage Schedule with Shortcuts
item.description: How I built a Shortcut that fetches my city’s garbage schedule from a CSV, translates it into plain English, and tells me exactly which bins to put out each collection day.

item.title: Automating Fire Ban Updates with Shortcuts
item.description: I built a Shortcut that pulls Dysart et al.’s fire ban feed, checks for “Fire Ban,” and shows the result in a simple HTML card. It’s fast, customizable, and gives me an instant, glanceable update from raw municipal data.

item.title: Automating Toronto’s Beach Water Quality with Shortcuts
item.description: A Shortcut that pulls Toronto’s beach water quality data and shows a simple, color-coded report in Safari.

item.title: TTC Service Alerts Shortcut: Real-Time Transit Notifications Made Simple
item.description: Shortcut for real-time TTC service alerts in a clean, scannable view.
